holidays.title: As Young As You Feel Day
holidays.description: Put the ‘you’ in ‘youth’ this As Young As You Feel Day!

holidays.title: Bavarian Crepes Day
holidays.description: Did you know that a Bavarian crepe from Bavaria is called a ‘palatschinke?'

holidays.title: Daffodil Day
holidays.description: Daffodil Day usually raises funds and awareness for cancer using this cheerful symbol.

holidays.title: Emancipation Day (Puerto Rico)
holidays.description: Check out the Puerto Rican way to commemorate and celebrate Emancipation Day.

holidays.title: Founding Anniversary of the Philippine Army
holidays.description: Salute the might and bravery of the Philippine Army as we mark its founding anniversary.

holidays.title: Gryffindor Pride Day
holidays.description: Get ready for a magical ride as we explore the strong and proud house of Gryffindor!

holidays.title: International Goof-off Day
holidays.description: Today is the day to let your inner goofball out and have a good time.

holidays.title: International Seal Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate seals and learn some fascinating and amazing facts about them.

holidays.title: National Donald Day
holidays.description: On National Donald Day, let’s celebrate and appreciate every Donald in the world.

holidays.title: Nauryz Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the coming of spring and raise a toast to new beginnings on Nauryz Day.

holidays.title: Nevruz Day
holidays.description: It's a new day, a new dawn, a new life; it's Nevruz Day!

holidays.title: Talk Like William Shakespeare Day
holidays.description: I bite mine thumb at thee and thee asketh me wherefore I’m biting mine thumb.

holidays.title: Talk Like William Shatner Day
holidays.description: Can you imitate William Shatner? Well, now is the day to test your talent!

holidays.title: World Day of Metta
holidays.description: Stop, take a breath, and look for the best in someone — and yourself.

holidays.title: World Water Day
holidays.description: World Water Day aims to bring water aide to people who truly need it across borders.

holidays.title: JJ Watt’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is the pizza delivery guy who shot his shot and hit the pot of gold.

holidays.title: Reese Witherspoon’s Birthday
holidays.description: The multi-talented actress, producer, and businesswoman has risen to become a powerful global celebrity.
